patthana15.28:1.1_0: Anidassanaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassano nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.28:2.1_0: Anidassanaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassano naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.28:3.1_0: Appaṭighaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.28:4.1_0: Appaṭighaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaṭigho naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
